import { useController } from '../../Controller' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import ReviewForm from '../../components/ReviewForm/ReviewForm' import Review from '../../components/Review/Review' import moviePageClasses from './moviePageClasses' export default function MoviePage({ user }) { const { getMoviePage, movie, setMovie, getAllReviews, reviews } = useController() const params = useParams() const id = params.id useEffect(() => { setMovie(getMoviePage(id)) }, []) return (
{movie && ( <>

{movie.Title}

Actors:

{movie.Actors}

Director:

{movie.Director}

Genre:

{movie.Genre}

{movie.Plot}

Runtime:

{movie.Runtime}

{movie?.Ratings?.map((rating, index) => (
{rating.Source}
{rating.Value}
))}

Reviews

{reviews && reviews.length > 0 && ( <> {reviews.map((review, i) => { if (review.movie === movie.imdbID) { return } return undefined })} )}
)}
) }
